insert.foreach: UPDATE product_list SET productID =#{item.productID}, productName =#{item.productName}, productValue =#{item.productValue}, productSum =#{item.productSum}, remark =#{item.remark}, flag =#{item.flag}, expireDate =#{item.expireDate}, inputDate =#{item.inputDate}, updateDate =#{item.updateDate}, userid =#{item.userid} WHERE serialno = #{item.serialno}
